#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;

void qsort(int arr[600], int fst, int last);

int main()
{
    int n,i,j,k,t;
    int a[600];
    int c[600];
    cin >> t;
    while(t--){
        cin >> n;
        for(i = 0; i < n; i++){
            cin >> a[i];
        }
        qsort(a,0,n-1);

        if (n%2) {
            for (i = 0; i < (n - 1) / 2; i++) {
                cout << a[n - i - 1] << " " << a[i] << " ";
            }
            cout << a[(n - 1) / 2] << endl;;
        }
        else {
            for (i = 0; i < n  / 2; i++) {
                cout << a[n - i - 1] << " " << a[i] << " ";
            }
            cout << endl;
        }
    }

    return 0;
}
void qsort(int arr[600], int fst, int last)
{
     int i,j,pivot,tmp;
     if(fst<last)
     {
       pivot=fst;
       i=fst;
       j=last;
       while(i<j)
       {
         while(arr[i]<=arr[pivot] && i<last)
            i++;
         while(arr[j]>arr[pivot])
            j--;
         if(i<j)
         {
            tmp=arr[i];
            arr[i]=arr[j];
            arr[j]=tmp;
         }
       }
       tmp=arr[pivot];
       arr[pivot]=arr[j];
       arr[j]=tmp;
       qsort(arr,fst,j-1);
       qsort(arr,j+1,last);
     }
}
